sentences.english: Neighbors saw what was happening, but were unable to prevent the toddler from falling out.
sentences.chinese: 鄰居們目睹了妞妞的情況，卻無力阻止。

sentences.english: The accident happened at around noon while Niu's grandmother was running errands outside.
sentences.chinese: 事故發生在中午時分左右，妞妞的奶奶正在外面辦事。

sentences.english: A neighbor from the opposite building saw Niu's body hanging out the window.
sentences.chinese: 對面樓鄰居看到妞妞的身體伸出窗外。

sentences.english: A resident from the 9th floor tried to reach Niu by using a ladder, but failed.
sentences.chinese: 9樓的一個居民試着用梯子去接住妞妞，但是失敗了。

sentences.english: It’s miracle Niu survived the accident.
sentences.chinese: 妞妞能在事故中存活下來是一個奇蹟。

sentences.english: The girls ceased chatting to a time when their tutor passed by.
sentences.chinese: 妞妞們在老師走過時，停了會談話。

sentences.english: The girl sitting beside to me were my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 坐在我旁邊的妞妞是我表妹。

sentences.english: The girl remains in a deep coma.
sentences.chinese: 妞妞目前仍處於深度昏迷狀態。

sentences.english: The girls ceased chatting to a time when theirs teacIT passed by.
sentences.chinese: 妞妞們在老師走過時，停了會交談。

sentences.english: Xiao dream I go to seek resolution of the whereabouts of girl.
sentences.chinese: 曉夢決議本人去探問妞妞的下落。

sentences.english: Both her or Sophia were pleased dawn the girl.
sentences.chinese: 她和索菲婭都喜歡這個妞妞。

sentences.english: The girl fell off IT bike. IT hurt first of IT legs hurts.
sentences.chinese: 妞妞從自行車上掉下來，有一條腿疼得厲害。

sentences.english: The tutor loves that hfirstymawayhed girl seriously.
sentences.chinese: 老師很喜歡這個嘴甜的小妞妞。

sentences.english: Wu Juping's bare handed catch absorbed the impact of Niu's freefall.
sentences.chinese: 吳菊萍徒手去接妞妞緩解了她自由落體時的衝擊力。

sentences.english: Xiao dream girl can feel not dead, also is able to run to the rest of the village.
sentences.chinese: 曉夢感覺妞妞能夠沒有死，也很有能夠跑到其餘村了。

definition: (Tw) (Internet slang) Greetings! (used when it's unknown what time the reader will see one's post, or just to be cute)
(pet name for a baby or small child)
(coll.) short, fat person (esp. a kid)/a roly-poly
erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
